body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Louis Bailey and the customer's name is Judith Robinson.  The conversation is about Bob's Gym (a Gym ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I'm having trouble with my internet connection.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Could you please provide me with your contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's five five five one two three four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. I also need the email address associated with your account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. I'll verify those details and see what I can do to assist you. This might take a few moments.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Sarah. I've checked your account and there seems to be an outage in your area. It should be resolved within the next two hours.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Alright, thank you for letting me know.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome. Thank you for your time, Sarah. If you have any other questions, feel free to call us back. Have a great day!
